intro.content: Gary Vaynerchuk is considered one of the most actively vigorous social media influencers, predicting that Web 3.0, NFTs and blockchain will become the greatest game-changers in technology that will zealously restructure the entirety of today's technological foundations.

description.content: Garyvee is also considered an early investor in gigantic technological behemoths, where he recognized early potential in companies such as Snap, Meta (previously Facebook), Twitter and Coinbase.
